entries.message: upgraded er2 instead of er1, due to connectivity issues on oobm

Event Type: Network Emergency

We are performing system changes in the Miami location during the following emergency maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-04-29 07:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-04-29 11:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Miami instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the emergency maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Silicon Valley location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-04-27 10:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-04-27 14:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Silicon Valley instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
